## N > 1 all positions of G AND alpha



```{r}
its <- 500
N <- 20
TT <-10
Q <- 3
K <- 6

sigeps2 <- 1
gvec <- seq(0, 1, length.out = K)

V <- diag(1, K, K)
W <- diag(1, Q, Q)

G <- c(
  rev(gvec), (gvec)
) %>%
  matrix(K, Q)


mu_qs <- G
var_qs <- .1


ITSKEEPER <- matrix(nrow = 500, ncol = 500)

# for(j in 1:500){
  
  
  
  etas <- rnorm(TT*N*Q) %>%
    array(dim = c(TT,Q,N))
  
  epsilon <- rnorm(TT*N*K, sd = sqrt(sigeps2)) %>%
    array(dim = c(K,TT,N))
  
  alphas <- apply(etas, c(2,3), cumsum)
  alphas <- lapply(1:N, function(i)alphas[,,i])
  
  
  y <- lapply(1:N, function(i){
    tcrossprod(G, alphas[[i]]) + epsilon[,,i]
  })
  

  
  
  G.star <- G
  # G.star[1,1] <- 0

  G.track <- array(dim = c(dim(G), its))
  
  k <- 1
  q <- 2
  qtil <- which((1:Q) != q)
  
  

  i <- 1
  
  for(i in 1:its){
    
    
    alpha.star <- lapply(y, function(yout)ffbs.joint(y = yout, G = G, V = diag(1, K, K), W = diag(1, Q, Q), m0 = 0, C0 = diag(10, Q, Q))$x)
    

    for(k in 1:K){
      yk <- lapply(y, function(x)x[k,])
      Galpha <- lapply(1:N, function(ind) G.star[k,] * alpha.star[[ind]])
      
      YGA <- lapply(1:N, function(ind) yk[[ind]] - t(Galpha[[ind]]))
      
      for(q in 1:Q){
        
        
        
        
        
        
        qtil <- which((1:Q) != q)
        
        aq <- lapply(1:N, function(ind)alpha.star[[ind]][q,])
        
        numer <- lapply(1:N, function(ind)sum(aq[[ind]] * YGA[[ind]][,qtil])) %>%
          unlist() %>%
          sum
        
        denom <- lapply(1:N, function(ind)alpha.star[[ind]][q,]^2) %>%
          unlist() %>%
          sum
        
        
        # sum(aq * YGA[,qtil])
        
        
        gskMean <- (sigeps2 * mu_qs[k,q] + var_qs  * numer) / (sigeps2 + var_qs * denom)
        
        gskVar <- sigeps2 * var_qs / (sigeps2 + var_qs * denom)
        
        
        G.star[k, q] <- rnorm(1, gskMean, sqrt(gskVar))
      }
    }
    
    G.track[,,i] <- G.star
  }
  
#   ITSKEEPER[,j] <- G.track[1,1,]
# 
# }
kp <- 1
qp <- 2


for(kp in 1:K){
  for(qp in 1:Q){
    plot(
      G.track[kp,qp,],
      main = paste(
        kp, ", ", qp, "    ",
        G[kp,qp],
        ": (", 
        paste( round(quantile(G.track[kp,qp,], c(0.025, 0.975)), 3), collapse = ", "),
        ")", 
        sep = ""
      )
    )
    abline(h = G[kp,qp])
  }
}
```
